task.title: How to Get a Giant Chocolate Ice Cream Cone
task.shortdesc: College can be hard sometimes. Treat yourself to an ice cream cone when you're sad. You can also bring a friend or a date to make it more fun!

step.cmd: Leave your residence hall and walk over to Deets Place. Deets Place is located underneath D2 Dining Hall.

info.note: If you are having trouble finding Deets or D2, here is a link to a campus map: http://www.maps.vt.edu/PDF/campus-map-highres.pdf

step.cmd: Once you've arrived at Deets, walk up to the ice cream counter and tell the employee you'd like a double scoop chocolate ice cream cone

info.note: The ice cream tastes best in a waffle cone. Plus, the waffle cone is bigger than the cake cone, so you will get more ice cream

step.cmd: Pay for your giant chocolate ice cream cone with your Hokie passport
